text: Shutter is a 2008 American mystery horror thriller movie released on March 21, 2008. It is about a newly married couple finding disturbing, ghostly images in photographs they develop after a tragic accident. Fearing the manifestations may be connected, they investigate and learn that some mysteries are better left unsolved. ==References== == Other websites == * * * * * Category:2008 horror movies Category:2000s mystery movies Category:2008 thriller movies Category:2000s horror thriller movies Category:American mystery movies Category:American horror thriller movies Category:2000s English-language movies Category:2000s ghost movies
title: Shutter (2008 movie)
